name: cooked chicken
notes: cut into thin batons (2 large cooked breasts, Note 1)

name: cucumbers
notes: remove seeds then finely sliced into half moons (or 1 long continental/English cucumber)

name: large carrot
notes: peeled then julienned (I use a shredder)

name: mint leaves
notes: large leaves roughly torn by hand (Note 4)

name: fish sauce
notes: (sub light or all purpose soy sauce)

name: red chilli
notes: deseeded then very finely minced (birds eye or Thai Red Chilli best, Note 3)

name: peanuts, roasted unsalted
notes: finely chopped (~1/3 cup once chopped, Note 5)

name: oil
notes: vegetable or canola (or other plain oil)

name: chicken thighs, bone in skin on
beef tenderloin, raw, very thinly sliced
chicken thigh fillets
notes: skinless and boneless or breast (or pork, beef or any seafood)

name: stalk lemongrass
notes: white part only, bruised them sliced into pieces easy to pick out later (Note 1)

name: soy sauce
notes: (all purpose or light, NOT dark soy)

name: onion
notes: finely diced (brown, white or yellow) (~1/2 cup)

name: Cha Lua Vietnamese pork loaf OR chicken loaf
roast or grilled pork cold cuts
cucumbers
notes: finely sliced lengthwise into long strips

name: green onion stems
notes: cut into the length of the rolls

name: jicama
notes: apple or daikon, grated with a box grater (Note 1)

name: leftover cooked brisket or other beef
Finely sliced red chilli, sliced cucumber, crushed peanuts*
lemongrass paste or fresh finely chopped
pork shoulder
notes: (butt) or boneless skinless pork belly, cut into 3 cm / 1.2" pieces (Note 1a)

name: Red chilli and finely sliced shallots/green onions
small cooked prawns/shrimp (about 12cm/5" in length, unpeeled including the head)
lettuce leaves - use a lettuce with soft leaves, like Oak or Butter Lettuce (Note 2)
crushed chilli, samba oelak or other chilli paste, adjust to taste (optional)
medium shrimp
notes: (prawns), shelled and deveined (about 5 - 7 oz / 150 - 200g, excluding shells)

name: very finely chopped red chili
notes: adjust to taste (I use birds eye which is spicy)

name: chilli sauce
notes: (sriracha, chilli paste) or 1 birds eye chilli, finely chopped

name: stalk lemongrass
notes: white part only, bruised them sliced into 1cm/0.5" pieces

name: red birdseye chilli
notes: finely chopped (or adjust quantity to your taste)
